name: Mezzoloth
damage_resistances: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from Nonmagical Attacks

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
The mezzoloth’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 11). The mezzoloth can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
2/day each: darkness, dispel magic
1/day: cloudkill

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The mezzoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Magic Weapons
special_abilities.desc: The mezzoloth’s weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mezzoloth makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its trident.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Trident
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage when held with two claws and used to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: The mezzoloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.
